release.change: You can now add descriptions for all folders allowing you to add descriptions for narrators and series
Improved login screen (Based on Asti.ga's DSub fork, thank you Koenvh1)
Updated the UI for when looking at a book
Updated the UI for when looking at an author or series
Added a help / support menu under settings
Descriptions can now be added to all folders (on the server) including series and author folders
The add server menu now has a link to help/instructions
Changelog is no longer shown on first start after update, it can still be shown from the top right menu.
Cache is now called downloads since most other streaming software use that term meaning that's what new users will look for.
Permanent cache is now removed as people found it confusing with two types but it will come back if people ask for it.
Simplified menus, this means that some old music oriented features from DSub have been removed, if you want any of them back let me know
Possible fix for bug that caused crashes that I have not been able to reproduce
Possible fix for ssl bug that I have not been able to reproduce
Fixed a bug where the app would not pause on focus loss (gps talking etc) even if it was set to do so
Fixed a bug where playback would not work in offline mode
Now supports player.fm without needing to manually find RSS feed
Internal changes to how RSS feeds are collected for podcasts
When the app has been used for a while it will ask if you want to rate it
Possible WA for DownloadService crash that I can not reproduce
Better error message for incorrect username or password
Improved picker for sleeptimer (Thank you KBerstene!)
Fixed bug with cached files in some instances not playing in the right order (Thank you Starkad!)
iTunes, Acast, Podbean and Cloudflare podcasts now works without needing to find the RSS feed first.
Fixed several bugs that caused the app to crash in some instances
Added Genres and Recent lists to the main view
Added login screen for easy setup (Thanks hjone72!)
Moved logs from Pastebin to my server for privacy
The demo server is now running Booksonic
Updated to use DSub 5.3.4 (Changes below are from DSub)
Variable playback speed (has been tweaked a bit)
The app will tell you if the server is outdated
If app is in Swedish it will look at boktipset.se before checking Google Books if the server has no book description
Added a classic theme to bring back the old Booksonic design
Sleeptimer will reset if you shake the phone
Server and account info can be included in import/export
Heard status can now be imported/exported
Keeping track of played tracks should be much more reliable.
The app keeps track of what you have listened to
Improved tablet dual pane behavior (DSub update)
Some of the new feautures requires server update to Booksonic 1.0 Beta1 or newer
